data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pinus sylvestris (Scotch pine) from sample VEOLIA-41

Exposition NE, Slope 10 deg, Geology: Silikat-Schiefer, Tree line 950 m, av. Tree height 12 m, Tree cover 30%, Shrub cover 60%, Herb cover 80%, Moss cover 25%, Vegatation type: Phyllodoco-Vaccinion, Film number: 546A
